High Priest Marie:
Congratulations! You have advanced one level as a child of the goddess. Advancing in life may bring both joy and sorrow. But you will walk your path with Einhasad's blessing and Eva's protection. Congratulations again!
Here is a small gift to help you on your journey. Take it to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
